attributes.action: should be illegal to have a fish finger sandwich without tomato ketchup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it should be illegal to have a fish finger sandwich without tomato ketchup. Other tomato sauces are available. The children of today need a steady hand along the road to manhood. I truly believe that by showing the children the right way along life’s paths that we can make a difference. Children have not been guided enough and now we face the fact that, tracksuit bottoms tuck into socks, telephone boxes are now toilets, bus shelters are for smashing and fence panels are for kicking.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
